title: WebSocket Integration

history.message: GOD TIER UPGRADE v341-OMEGA-PLUS-ULTRA: Added System CPU Stats, Process Memory Advanced, and Process Thread Stats. Verified 146/146 tests passed.
SUPREME UPGRADE v340-ULTIMATE: Added Process CPU Percent, System Network Errors/Drops, and Active/Inactive Memory. Verified 143/143 tests passed.
